articles.title: US police chief and officer who fatally shot black man both resign - ABC News
articles.description: A police officer who fatally shot a black American two days ago resigns, along with the police chief in Brooklyn Center, Minnesota, the city's mayor says.
articles.content:
A police officer who "mistakenly" fatally shot a black American two days ago has resigned, along with the police chief in Brooklyn Center, Minnesota.
